title: Club issues
body: I created a club called KamiS but now I can't see my club in my client club list and I can't use my club tag now. How can I fix this{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
There are some lingering club issues that are still out there. We're dealing with these on a case-by-case basis, so I'd recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further and assist you with this.

Let me know if you encounter issues submitting your ticket.
